data.message: ( Not Gay ) But I Love This Guy! He is just an entetainer but he gives so much light in peoples souls and everyone who really know his life story and all his songs knows that he is inspirational and give people lifes hope and luck when u sad listen to eminem when u angry listen to eminem when you down listen to eminem when u happy listen to eminem  when u go training listen to eminem he gives me strength without his music and just Eminem i dont really who or what i became! What i am today ! THNKYOU!
